Por su parte menciona sentirse a gusto con su banco comunal por el trabajo solidario que desempeñan.
Con el dinero del crédito comprará panteones, juguetes, algo de ropa y adornos para expenderlos en su tienda de abarrotes, pues sabe que en estas próximas fechas las ventas serán cuantiosas.
texts.en:
Marcela is 52 years old and is a very happy, enthusiastic woman.  She’s married to Marcos and they have three adult children together.  She and her husband live alone in a home of their own, in Puente Paucartambo.  Marcela is a farmer, along with her husband, Marcos.  They work in the fields and in this way she supported and educated her children, who now have their own families and educations.

With the same hard work, Marcela opened a small food store, where she sells primary needs products.  The local inhabitants begin visiting her store during the first hours of the day, because they know the amount of goods she stocks.  She needs to invest in merchandise.  “I never get careless about my businesses, because they are vital for me,” she says.

She also makes, sells, and repairs clothing.  In this way she generates extra income for any eventuality.  As if that was not enough, she also buys and sells coffee, which she sells to the cooperatives in the city. 

Marcela says that, thanks to her work, she has managed to create an adequate life, which has allowed her to buy some things that she could not previously afford.  She will continue this rhythm into her old age.  Thanks to your help, this will be her 10th loan through MFP.  For this reason, she promises to make her payments on time.  She says that she feels comfortable with her communal bank, because of all the work they do together.

She will use the money from this loan to buy pants, toys, and some clothing and decorations for her grocery store.  She knows that sales will be greater in the coming days.

loans.use: to buy clothing and toys to sell for the Christmas season.

loans.name: Edith Elena

texts.es: La socia es la Sra. Edith; continua con su negocio de compra y venta de ropa, la socia en estas fiestas navideñas desea poder invertir el credito en la compra de ropa a pedido que le han hecho sus clientas y viajar para traer pantalones jeans, polos femeninos y de varones, correas, carteras. La socia es una mujer muy trabajadora y desea seguir creciendo economicamnete para poder establecer un negocio mas formal. La socia soliciat el prestamo para invertir en la compra de ropa para damas y de carteras y correas.
texts.en: Edith continues her business of buying and selling clothing.  She would like this loan to be able to invest in clothing for the Christmas season.  She’s gotten many orders from customers.  She will buy jeans, polo shirts for women and men, belts, and wallets.  She is a hardworking woman and would like to continue growing financially and be able to start a more formal business.

loans.use: to fill customer orders.

loans.name: Linda

texts.es:
Linda de 41 años es una mujer soltera de 3 hijos de 20, 18 y 11 años. Ella y sus hijos viven en una casa alquilada en la ciudad de La Merced. Linda es una mujer trabajadora. Se levanta muy temprano para preparar distintos alimentos y comidas, los que ofrece en su restaurante.
“Lo que mas se vende son desayunos y almuerzos”, afirma. Su local se ubica en las cercanías de entidades estatales, de cuyos trabajadores y servidores, salen a comer. Por clientela no se preocupa, ya que gracias a su sazón y variedad de platos ha logrado captar público fiel.
Desde hace 2 años, Linda cuenta con ese rentable negocio. Gracias a su desempeño ha podido sacar adelante a sus hijos. Los 2 mayores están estudiando en la universidad y sin embargo la apoyan en el restaurante.
Como toda una mujer visionaria, para unos años después, planifica ampliar su local y aumentar más mesas. Así como preparar  platos a la carta, para horarios nocturnos. Para ello, Linda necesitará de mucha ayuda. Esta sería la primera vez que Linda accedería a un préstamo de MFP, por esa razón da su palabra de ser puntual en el pago de las cuotas mensuales. Se siente muy a gusto con su recientemente formado banco comunal del que espera alcanzar progreso. De recibir el dinero, logrará invertir en la compra de vidrios para las mesas, manteles nuevos, arreglará su lavadora con los servicios de un gasfitero, pintará sus paredes y si sobra el dinero comprará bebidas. Así mejorará la apariencia de su establecimiento.
texts.en:
Linda, 41, is a single woman with 3 children: 20, 18 and 11.  She and her children live in a rented house in La Merced.  Linda is a hard-working woman who gets up very early to prepare different food and meals that she sells in her restaurant.
She tells us that she sells “breakfasts and lunches the most”.  She has her stall near government buildings where the workers and employees go out to eat.  She is very concientious with her customers and thanks to the flavor and variety of the dishes, she has been able to attract a loyal public.
Linda has had this profitable business for the past 2 years.  Thanks to her effort she has been able to get her children ahead.  The 2 oldest are studying at the university but they still help her in the restaurant.
As a woman thinking ahead, she would like to enlarge her space a few years from now, and add more tables.  Not only making the food on the menu, but also because of  the late hours, Linda needs a lot of help.  This will be the first time that Linda has applied for a loan with MFP, and that is why she promises to make all the monthly payments on time.  She feels very good with the newly formed communal bank that she hopes will show progress.  She will use the money to buy glass for the tables, new tablecloths, have a plumber fix her dishwasher, paint the walls, and if there is any money left, she will buy drinks.  This work will improve the appearance of the business.

loans.use: to buy glass to protect the tables, paint, and drinks

loans.name: Nieves

texts.es:
Nieves de 44 años, es una mujer carismática y afable. Vive con su pareja, Pablo, con quien tiene un hijo de 12 años en una casa propia en la ciudad de La Merced. Nieves asimila rápidamente. El negocio que tiene lo aprende ayudando a su cuñada quien se dedica a la venta de carne.
De esa manera, Nieves inicia sus labores desde las 4 de la tarde. Para ello compra aves de corral como: gallinas, pollos y patos, los que beneficia y despluma. 
“Trabajo sola, una vez que terminó de desplumar y desviscerar a los animales los meto a la congeladora para repartirlos al día siguiente”, explica. Para este negocio, viaja 2 veces a la semana a la ciudad de Huancayo, de donde trae las aves a menor precio.
“Cuando compro el kilo me sale a 12 soles, pero lo vendo a 19 o 20 soles. Si se gana bien”, comenta.
Con el pasar de los años y la continuidad de su negocio, Nieves espera alquilar e instalar un kiosco en el óvalo de la ciudad, así ya no tendrá que llevar su producto a las manos de sus clientes. Éste sería su primer préstamo de MFP, por eso se compromete a ser puntual en el pago de las cuotas. “Mujeres al éxito”, es el nombre de su banco comunal y se siente muy entusiasmada de pertenecerlo. De recibir el dinero del crédito, lo invertirá en la compra de aves de corral como: gallinas, patos y pollos; y como la demanda sube en fiestas navideñas, también adquirirá pavos, para continuar con su negocio.
texts.en:
Nieves is 44 years old and is a charasmatic and affable woman. She lives with her partner Pablo with whom she has 1 child, 12 years old, in her own house in the city of Merced. Nieves learns quickly. She learned the business helping her sister-in-law who sells meat. Thus Nieves starts her work from 4 in the afternoon. For this she buys poultry such as hens, chickens and ducks which benefit from being plucked. "I work alone. Once I've finished plucking and eviscerating the poultry I put them in the freezer for distribution the next day," she explains. For this work, she goes twice a week to the city of  Huancayo where she gets poultry at a better price. "I pay 12 soles a kilo but sell it for 19 or 20 doles. It's good money," she says.

With the passing of time and the continuity of her business, Nieves hopes to rent and fit out a kiosk in the city oval so there will be no need to deliver her product straight to her customers hands. This will be her first loan with MFP so she agrees to be punctual with her repayments. "Mujeres al Exito" is the name of her communal bank and she is very exicted at belonging to the group. On receiving the loan she will invest it in the purchase of poultry such as: hens, ducks and chickens and as demand grows with the Christmas season she will also buy turkeys to continue her business.

loans.use: to buy poultry such as chickens. ducks, hens and turkeys.

loans.name: Yanet

texts.es: Yanet, de 32 años convive con Hugo, su pareja y padre de sus 2 hijos de 12 y 6 años, a quienes cría y educa en su casa propia en el anexo de Puente Paucartambo. Yanet como una mujer trabajadora, se dedica a la agricultura. En sus hectáreas de terrenos tiene sembrado plátanos y plantas de café, los que comercializa en la ciudad de La Merced a las cooperativas cafetaleras quienes le dan buenas ganancias por sus productos. “El café de esta zona es bien solicitado, por eso cuando cosecha lo vendo rápido”, comenta. Por su parte, Hugo, su pareja, trabaja en el campo en los cultivos, limpiando, abonando y para la cosecha tiene que contratar peones, por ser una faena dura. Y cuando el trabajo en los umbríos cesa, Hugo labora en propiedades ajenas como operario, de esa manera obtiene ingresos para el día a día. Y como Yanet no se conforma, también se dedica a la elaboración de viveros de café, los que vende de 400 a 450 soles el millar. Yanet espera darles una buena educación a sus hijos para ello seguirá trabajando duro y parejo. Éste sería su préstamo número 10 de MFP, por esa razón se compromete a ser puntual en el pago de las cuotas como lo fue en los ciclos pasados. Además menciona sentirse muy contenta con su banco comunal, ya que fue una de las fundadoras. De recibir el dinero, Yanet invertirá en la compra de abonos, plantas de café y bolsas, para la elaboración de los viveros.
texts.en: Yanet is 32 years old and lives with her partner Hugo. the father of her 2 children, aged 12 & 6 years, who she raises and educates in her own house in Puente Paucartambo. Yanet as a hardworking woman, works as a farmer. On her hectares of farmland she grows bananas and coffee which she sells in the city of Merced to the coffee cooperatives who give her a good price for her products. "The coffee from this region is well sought after which is why my crop sells quickly," she comments. For his part, Hugo, her partner, works in the fields, cleaning and spreading manure; for the harvest he has to hire manual labourers as it is hard work. And when the work in the fields is finished, Hugo works on other neighbouring propeties as a labourer and so earns an income day to day. Not content, Yanet also has a coffee plant nursery and sells the plants at 400 to 450 soles per thousand. Yanet hopes to give her children a good education and will continue to work hard and long to achieve this. This would be her 10th loan with MFP and for this reason she agrees to be punctual with her repayments as she was with her past loan cycles. In addition she mentions feeling very happy with her communal bank as she was one of the founding members. On receiving the money, Yanet will invest in the purchase of manure, coffee plants and bags to be used in the nurseries.

loans.use: to buy sacks of organic manure.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy more materials for preparing desserts.

loans.name: Aidee

texts.es:
Aidee es una mujer incansable. Tiene 45 años de edad y está felizmente casada con Pablo, con quién tiene 4 hijos, pero solo vive con 2 de ellos, en el barrio de Santa Rosa, en el anexo de Puente Paucartambo – Chanchamayo. Aidee hace de todo. Gracias a su habilidad ha podido mantener y educar a sus 4 hijos. Actualmente cuenta con una tienda de comestibles en la que vende gaseosas, golosinas y productos de primera necesidad. En el mismo puesto expende carne de pollo, que es su negocio más rentable. “Cada semana estaré vendiendo como 50 a 70 pollos. Para eso bajo para La Merced (ciudad y capital la provincia de Chanchamayo) dos veces a la semana para comprar los pollos”, comenta.
De igual manera, cuenta con 6 lotes de terrenos agrícolas, en los que siembra café, plátanos y paltas. En este trabajo obtiene ganancias considerables pero como son temporadas y el precio es inestable, prefiere dedicarse con empeño a su negocio de ventas.
Más adelante, le gustaría instalar una bodega más amplia, donde ofrecería todo tipo de productos y confía, que con esfuerzo y constancia lo puede conseguir. Con su ayuda, Aidee podrá acceder a su préstamo número 10 de MFP, por esa razón será responsable en el pago de las cuotas, como lo ha hecho en los ciclos anteriores. Con respecto a “Luz del Futuro”, su banco comunal, menciona sentirse muy a gusto y satisfecha con el trabajo en equipo. Invertirá el dinero en la compra de pollos beneficiados para expenderlos en su tienda ubicada en su propia casa.
texts.en:
Aidee is a tireless woman. She is 45 years old and is happily married to Pablo with whom she has 4 children, 2 of whom live with her in the Santa Rosa neighbourfood in Puente Paucartambo - Chanchamayo. Aidee can do anything. Thanks to this ability, she has been able to take care of and educate her 4 children. Currently, she has a grocery store where she sells soft drinks, sweets and staple products. In the same store, she sells chicken meat which is her most profitable business, "Every week I sell about 50 to 70 chickens. For this I go down to La Merced (city and provincial capital of Chanchamayo) twice a week to buy the chickens," she says. 

Similarly, with 6 plots of farmland, she grows coffee, bananas and avocados. With this work she makes a significant profit but as it is seasonal and the price is not fixed, she prefers to work hard at her store. In the future, she would like to set up a bigger grocery store where she would offer all kinds of products and, she says, in confidence, that with effort and perseverance she can achieve this. With your help, Aidee can access her 10th loan with MFP and for this reason she will be responsible with the repayments of her loan as she has been with her previous loan cycles. With regards "Luz del Futuro", her communal bank, she says that she feels very comfortable and satisfied with the teamwork. She will invest the money in the purchase of frozen chickens to sell in her store located in her own house.

loans.use: to buy chickens to sell as meat in her shop.

loans.name: Gladys

texts.es: La socia es la Sra. Gladys; en esta ocasión desea invertir el credito para comprar y abastecer su negocio de venta de productos de belleza por catalogo, la socia también desea invertir en la compra de carteras y zapatos, ella desea traer mercadería para vender a sus clientes y amistades. La socia desea invertir su credito en la compra de carteras, zapatos e implementar su stock de productos de belleza por catalogos.
texts.en: The member is Gladys, and she now wants to invest her loan to increase her supply of beauty products, which she sells from catalogues. She also wants to buy wallets and shoes, so that she has merchandize to sell to her clients and friends. She will buy wallets, shoes, and increase her supply of beauty products.

loans.use: to buy wallets, shoes, and increase her supply of beauty products.

loans.name: Barbara Hilda

texts.es: La socia es la Sra. Barbara continua con su negocio de la tienda de abarrotes y su restaurante, la socia se organiza muy bien y trabaja mucho por lo menos tendra este ritmo un par de años mas para poder luego descanzar y solo dedicarse a su tienda de abarrotes. La socia en esta ocasión desea invertir el prestamo en la compra de productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azucar, fideos, leche, panetones para las fiestas navideñas entre otros y también viveres e ingredientes para el restaurante.
texts.en: This member is Barbara, who has continued with her grocery store and restaurant businesses. She is well organized and works very hard, and she will have to do so for at least another couple of years before she can relax and focus only on her grocery store.  On this occasion Barbara has requested a loan to buy staple goods like rice, sugar, noodles, milk, panettone for Christmas, and other ingredients and provisions she needs for her restaurant.

loans.use: to buy staple goods such as rice, sugar, noodles, milk, panettone for Christmas, and other ingredients and provisions she needs for her restaurant.

loans.name: El Hadji

texts.fr:
Monsieur El Hadji est chauffeur depuis 25 ans .Il est marié et père de 6 enfants. Il est âgé de 50 ans et ne connait  pratiquement  que le transport
Avec le crédit il veut réfectionner son véhicule taxi : changer  les portes, les ailes, les feux, les amortisseurs.
Monsieur El Hadji a une grande famille mais avec le revenu de ses  taxis il arrive à subvenir à leur besoins quotidiens.
texts.en:
El Hadji is 50 years old, married and the father of 6 children. He has been a driver for 25 years and cannot imagine earning a living any other way. He will use this loan to repair his taxi and get the doors, wings, lights and shocks absorbers replaced.

El Hadji has a large family but the income from his taxi service allows him to take care of their daily needs.

loans.use: to repair his taxi.

loans.name: Gloria Maria

texts.es:
Gloria emprendedora, mujer humilde, oficio costurera, tiene su negocio de venta de ropa, también trabaja por encargos, anteriormente realizo mejoras a la vivienda. Sus planes es seguir construyendo y ampliar su negocio. 
En este ciclo de préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de mercadería ya que para estos tiempos de navidad las ventas aumentan y a su vez se prepara también para el inicio de un nuevo año escolar siendo necesario comprara los siguientes productos: ropa para damas, (blusas, pantalones, faldas), ropa para caballeros, zapato, cartera, bisutería, camisolas, camisetas, ropa interior, entre otras mercaderías. Obteniendo ganancias que serán invertidas en el mejoramiento de su nivel de vida.
texts.en:
Gloria is a humble, enterprising seamstress. She has her own business selling clothing, and she also takes orders. Previously she made improvements to her home. Her plan is to continue building and to extend her business.

In this loan cycle she will invest in buying merchandise because during the Christmas season sales increase. At the same time she can prepare for the beginning of a new school year as it is necessary to purchase the following items: women's clothing (blouses, trousers, skirts), men's clothing, footwear, jewelry, wallets, camisoles, t-shirts, underwear, as well as other goods. The profits she obtains will be invested into improving her standard of living.

loans.use: to buy clothes for resale.

loans.name: Mery

texts.es:
Mery de 44 años de edad, es una mujer soltera pero con 7 hijas de 21, 19, 18, 17, 11, 8 y 3 años. Mery tiene una familia grande y unida, 3 de sus hijos mayores viven en la ciudad de Huancayo, por estar estudiando, mientras que ella vive con 4 de ellos en una casa propia en el distrito de San Pedro de Cajas. Mery trabaja mucho y siempre se las arregla para no descuidar sus pedidos. En el calor de su hogar, abrió un taller de confecciones de textiles a los que entrega su vida desde hace 20 años. Con esta actividad y su esfuerzo ha podido educar a sus hijos, ya que 3 de ellos se encuentran estudiando en la universidad. Está contenta y orgullosa. Mery es una excelente confeccionista de mantas, faldas, vestimentas autóctonas, frazadas, etc. Cuando coge el hilo y la aguja deja volar su creatividad, es así que sus pedidos no cesan. “En diciembre ya no tengo tiempo para nada, el trabajo es agotador, pero no me quejo por que sé que es bueno”, comenta.
Ahora está trabajando en un pedido de 250 mantas, que calcula terminará en 2 meses. Cada manta la ofrece a 10 soles. Para agilizar su trabajo sus hijos la apoyan. Cada quien tiene su función que puede ser cortar, coser, bordar, etc., de esa manera ahorra en el pago de personal. 
De su actividad espera mucho, aún tiene hijos pequeños a los que quiere ver realizados, por eso continuará con su diaria lucha. Mery pertenece a un grupo comunal, pero por la necesidad de sus pedidos, desea obtener un préstamo de MFP, por ello se compromete a ser puntual en el pago de las cuotas, como lo fue en muchas oportunidades. Invertirá el dinero en la compra de telas de diferentes calidades, marcas y colores para confeccionar más mantas y vestimentas autóctonas que son usadas como disfraces en las fiestas patronales, muy costumbristas en los distritos de la sierra del Perú.
texts.en:
44-year-old Mery is single with 7 daughters aged 21, 19, 18, ​​17, 11, 8 and and 3. Mery has a large, close-knit family. Her three grown children live in the city of Huancayo, where they are studying. Mery lives with the other four in her own house in the district of San Pedro de Cajas. 

20 years ago, Mery opened a clothing and textiles workshop in her home to which she has dedicated her life ever since. Mery works hard and always manages to fulfill her orders. Due to her efforts in her business, she has been able to educate her children; three of them are now studying in college which makes her happy and proud. 

Mery is an excellent manufacturer of garments such as woolen and cotton blankets, skirts, native dresses, and so on. When she picks up the thread and needle, her creativity flows and this is why orders continue to come in. Mery says, "In December I have no time for anything, the work is exhausting, but I'm not complaining because I know it's good". 

Mery is currently working on an order of 250 blankets, which she estimates will be completed in two months. She sells each blanket for 10 soles. To help expedite the work, her children assist. Everyone has their own role, which could be to cut, sew, embroider, etc. This saves on paying staff to do these jobs. Mery has high hopes for her business, and will continue with her daily struggle as she still has young children whom she wants to see succeed.

Mery belongs to a community group, however due to the volume of orders she would like to obtain a loan from MFP. She therefore agrees to be punctual in her payments, as she has been on many previous occasions. The money will be invested in the purchase of fabrics of various qualities, brands and colors, with which Mery will make more blankets and clothing for use as costumes during the festival of the patron saint, which is a custom in the mountain districts of Peru.

loans.use: to purchase fabric of different colors and qualities, to produce her garments

loans.name: Martha Isabel

texts.es: La socia es la Sra. Martha Isabel; continua con el negocio de venta de ropa y cosméticos, la socia continua trabajndo de forma independiente y repartiendo a sus clientes y a las diferentes instituciones, la socia en esta ocasión desea invertir el prestamo en la compra de adornos navideños y de arboles navideños al pormayor, la socia desea aprovechar el epoca navideña e invertir el credito en la compra de arboles de navidad y de adornos navideños para decorar y de este modo incrementar sus ingresos y mejorar sus ventas, la socia desea el credito para solo por estas fechas invertir en los adornos navideños y los arboles.
texts.en:
The borrower is Martha Isabel who still has her clothes and cosmetics sales business. Martha continues to work independently, distributing goods to her customers and different institutions. 

She is requesting this loan to buy Christmas trees and decorations at wholesale cost. She would like to take advantage of the Christmas season and invest the loan in Christmas trees and decorations and by doing so increase her profits and improve her sales. She is requesting the loan just for this season to invest in Christmas trees and decorations.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of Christmas trees and Christmas decorations at wholesale cost.

loans.name: Maria Victoria

texts.es:
María Victoria de 46 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene 3 hijos de 18, 21 y 23 años de edad, dos ya se graduaron y solo uno estudia actualmente, vive en un barrio de Tela, Atlántida.
Doña María Victoria, se dedica a vender productos de la canasta básica familiar en una pulpería, vende arroz, frijoles, lácteos, embutidos, pastillas, productos de limpieza, pan, consome, azucar, churros etc. Hace 8 meses que la estableció con la ayuda de sus hijos,  uno de ellos tiene un empleo y le apoyó con la inversion. Le dedica todo el día desde las 7:00 am hasta las 8:00 p.m . Anteriormente ella trabajaba como ayudante de cocina. Con este préstamo va surtir el negocio en compra de lacteos, embutidos, granos basicos y pastillas, para incrementar sus ventas y poco a poco con préstamos lo va ir surtiendo más.
texts.en:
María Victoria, age 46, is a single mother.  She has three children; ages 18, 21, and 23.  Two of them have already graduated, and only one is currently in school.  She lives in the Tela neighborhood in Atlántida.

María Victoria sells food staples in a grocery store.  She sells rice, beans, dairy products, sausages, sweets, cleaning products, bread, consummé, sugar, and churros, etc.  She established her business eight months ago with the help of her children.  One of them has a job and helped her with the investment.

She works all day from 7:00 a.m. until 8:00 p.m.  She previously worked as a kitchen helper.

She will use this loan to stock her business by purchasing dairy products, sausages, basic grains, and sweets.  She will do this to increase her sales.  With loans she will be stocking her store little by little.

loans.use: to stock her business by purchasing dairy products, sausages, basic grains, sweets, and cleaning products, etc.

loans.name: Rio Vilcanota Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “RIO VILCANOTA”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Pisaq, perteneciente a la provincia de Calca y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Rosario; ella es conviviente y tiene 29 años y tiene 3 hijos; La socia trabaja con su negocio de venta de artesanía, la socia vende chompas, muñecas, pantalones y llaveros, la socia vende en la plaza de armas de Pisaq, ella trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de artesanía. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar artesanía como chompas, pantalones, llaveros y muñecas al por mayor. 

Los otros socios  se dedican al negocio de restaurant, negocio de venta de artesanía, negocio de tienda de abarrotes, negocio de venta de maíz, negocio de venta de verduras y negocio de venta de frutas.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members belong to the communal bank "RIO VILCANOTA".  This bank is located in the district of Pisaq, belonging to the providence of Calca and department of Cusco.

One member is Rosario; she has a live-in partner, is 29 years old and has 3 children.  The member works in her business of selling handicrafts. She sells sweaters, dolls, pants, and key-rings in the main plaza of Pisaq. She works from 8:00 a.m. till 5:00 p.m.  Through this business she is able to advance her children.  She wants to expand and improve her business of selling handicrafts.  The member is requesting the loan to buy handicrafts such as sweaters, pants, key-rings and dolls at wholesale.

The other members have a restaurant, sell handicrafts, run a grocery store, and sell corn, vegetables, and fruit.

The member thanks those who form part of this dream through this medium and she promises to fulfill her repayments in the period of time established.

loans.use: to buy handicrafts such as sweaters, pants, key-rings and dolls at wholesale.

loans.name: La Fe Group

texts.es:
Magali cuenta con 31 años de edad es casada tiene 4 hijos los cuales se encuentran estudiando Brenda la mayor estudia 1º de secundaria, Sandy está estudiando la primaria y miguel esta en 3º de preescolar tiene un bebe de un año 7 meses, su esposo se llama hidael es albañil.

Ella es comerciante vende empanadas de arroz con leche, harina y camote ya tiene 4 años con su negocio lo ha sabido sacar adelante sale a vender sus empanadas en varios pueblos para poder vender más y que le queden ganancias, ella invirtiera su préstamo en la compra de los insumos que utiliza para las empanadas como son: harina, aceite, azúcar, leche, etc.

Magali pertenece al grupo la fe el cual está integrado por 14 miembros dos hombres y 12 mujeres las cuales se definen como unas trabajadoras y todas se encuentran trabajando a continuación serán mencionadas: Abel, Marcelina, Ma del Refugio, Feliciana, Adelfa, Ángela, Teodora, María del Rocío, Ismael, Juana, Blanca, Silvestra, Esther. Todas realizan una actividad comercial como son: venta de productos de abarrotes, refrescos, frutas y verduras, pescaderia, comida, artículos domésticos, ollas de barros, etc.
texts.en:
Magali is 31-years-old and is married. She has 4 children, and those in school are Brenda, the oldest, who studies in the first year of middle school, Sandy, in elementary school, and Michael, in his third year of preschool. She has a 1 year, 7 month old baby. Her husband is named Hidael and is a bricklayer.

She is a merchant selling empendadas with rice pudding, flour, and sweet potato. She has had her business for 4 years and has known how to move it forward. She sells her empanadas in several towns in order to sell more and to maintain profits. She will invest her loan in the purchase of ingredients used for empanadas such as flour, oil, sugar, milk, etc.

Magali belongs the group "La Fe" [The Faith] which is composed of 14 members, 2 men and 12 women, who identify as hard workers and all of whom are working. They are mentioned as follows:  Abel, Marcelina, Ma. del Refugio, Feliciana, Adelfa, Ángela, Teodora, María del Rocío, Ismael, Juana, Blanca, Silvestra, and Esther. They all have businesses, like the sale of groceries, soft drinks, fruits and vegetables, fish, food, household items, clay pots, etc.

loans.use: to purchase supplies like flour, oil, sugar, and milk

loans.name: Candido

texts.es:
El señor cándido cuenta con 39 años de edad y está casado con la señora josefina con quien tiene 3 hijos, Mario, Roberto y Jorge quienes están estudiando, el mayor está cursando el primer año de secundaria, 1 más quinto año de primaria y el más pequeño segundo año de preescolar, el es pescador desde hace 2 años.
Dice que decidió iniciar con este buen negocio ya que es muy rentable y le deja buenas ganancias, las cuales le ayudaran para apoyar a su esposa, con los gastos de la casa y a sus hijos con su educación, también para contar con una mejor solvencia económica, como para tener un buen nivel de vida, el crédito que recibió lo va a invertir en la compra de mas material de trabajo como tarrayas, hilos y carnada.
Don cándido dice que una de las metas para su negocio, es la de continuar invirtiéndole muchísimo más, ya que tiene como objetivo hacerlo crecer aun mas, puesto que quiere poner un puesto de pescados y mariscos, para así mejorar e incrementar sus ganancias, ya que así continuara ahorrando, para poder asegurar la carrera profesional de sus hijos.
Ella está muy agradecido con fundación realidad, pero sobre todo con los prestatarios por la confianza y apoyo que le están brindando, ya que dice gracias a esta ayuda ahora tiene un mejor negocio y calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Candido, age 39, is married to Josefina.  They have three children; Mario, Roberto, and Jorge.  The children go to school.  The oldest is in his first year of high school, one is in the fifth year of elementary school, and the littlest one is in the second year of pre-school.  

He has been a fisherman for two years.  He says that he decided to start this good business because it is very profitable and gives him good income.  His earnings help him to support his wife, to pay the household expenses, and to pay for his children’s education.  They will also provide better financial solvency in order to have a better standard of living.

He will use the loan that he received to buy more working materials like cast nets, fishing line, and bait.  Candido says that one of his goals for his business in to continue investing in it much more.  His objective is to make it grow even more, andt he wants to set up a fish and seafood stand.  That way he will improve and increase his income.  He will continue saving in order to be able to assure his children of a professional career.

He is very grateful to the Fundación Realidad.  Above all he is grateful for the trust and support that the lenders are giving him.  He says that thanks to this help he now has a better business and a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more working materials like cast nets, fishing line, and bait.

loans.name: Luis Alberto

texts.es:
Luis siempre ha sido muy emprendedor y a pesar de que México es un pais conservador su familia lo ha apoyado mucho apesar de su preferencia sexual ya que eso no cambia el tipo de persona que es, tampoco lo hace ni peor ni mejor persona solo un individuo mas en la sociedad, una sociedad que apesar de los grandes cambios aun siguen padeciendo de una gran ignorancia, el tiene 36 años de edad y es soltero, tiene una pequeña tienda de abarrotes con la cual lleva  más de 1 año.
Dice que decidió invertir en esta actividad, buscado la manera de ofrecerle una vida de calidad a su madre ya que es él quien la cuida y también para contar con una mejor solvencia económica, el crédito que recibió lo va a invertir en la compra de mas mercancía como son: aceite, leche, arroz, galletas, agua, sopas, refrescos, huevos, jabón, etc. Y así tener mucho más surtido su negocio.
Una de las metas que tiene don Luis (ya que así lo conocen en su comunidad) para su negocio, es la de hacerla crecer muchísimo, ya que está pensando en mas adelante ampliar un poco su local, porque quiere poner una abarrotería, puesto que así contara con un amplio surtido y mejorara e incrementara mucho mas sus ingresos.
Le da las gracias a fundación realidad y a los prestatarios de kiva, por todo el apoyo y confianza que le están brindando, ya que esto le servirá de mucho, puesto que ahora puede continuar invirtiendo en su negocio y asegurar su futuro y el de su mamá.
texts.en:
Señor Luis Alberto is a very hardworking and determined person. He is 36 years old, single and without children. He has a small grocery store which he has run for more than a year. 

He says that he decided to invest in this business looking for a way to offer his mother a quality life as her caregiver and also improve his financial solvency. He will invest the loan he received in buying more goods such as: oil, milk, rice, biscuits, water, soups, soft drinks, eggs, soap, etc., and thus have a better stocked store. 

One of Don Luis' (as he is known in the neighbourhood) goals for his business is to make it grow a lot as he is thinking of in the future expanding his locale a little more as he wants to set up a larger grocery store. In this way he will be able to have a large assortment of goods and improve and increase his income a lot.

He gives Fundacion Realidad and the Kiva lenders his thanks for all the support and confidence they have provided him with, as this will help him a lot as he can now continue to invest in his business and secure his and his mother's future.

loans.use: to buy more goods such as: oil, milk, rice, biscuits, water, soft drinks, eggs, soap, etc.

loans.name: Amelia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal  ”RICCHARY CUSCO; El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac en la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Amelia;  La socia tiene 44 años de edad, la socia es soltera, La socia tiene 2 hijos de 23, 13 años de edad;  La socia se dedica  a la compra venta y alquiler de andamios metálicos para las construcciones; La socia desea el crédito para invertir en la compra de materiales para la fabricación de andamios metálicos para las construcciones para poder pintar las fachadas y colocar vidrios y otros. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de materiales para la fabricación de andamios.

La socia agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
Amelia is a member of the” RICCHARY CUSCO” communal bank, located in the Huanchac district, within the Cusco department and province.

She’s 44 years old, single, and has two children, ages 23 and 13.  She buys and rents out metal scaffolds for construction.  She would like this loan so that she can buy materials to make metal scaffolds to paint facades and other things.  She will also use the money to invest in supplies to make decorations.

She appreciates the loan and is committed to making her payments as agreed.

loans.use: to buy materials to build scaffolds.

loans.name: Edilia Margarita

texts.es:
La señora edila es una persona muy responsable y dice que le gusta mucho su trabajo, tiene 20 años de edad y es madre soltera, tiene una pequeña bebe de 3 meses de edad, se dedica a la venta de pescados y verduras en el mercado de la comunidad vecina desde hace mas de 2 años.
Ella decidió iniciar con este negocio, buscando una mejor calidad de vida para su hija y apoyar a su familia con los gastos de la casa, también para mejorar un poco mas su solvencia económica, así asegurar el futuro de su hija, el crédito que recibió va a invertirlo en la compra de mas pescados, chiles, jitomates, ejotes, calabacitas, chayotes, etc. para continuar con sus ventas.
El deseo más grande que tiene doña edila para su negocio, es el de incrementar su inversión, para hacerlo crecer rápidamente, ya que quisiera poner su frutería, y así mejorar e incrementar aún más sus ganancias, y continuar apoyando a su familia.
Esta muy satisfecha por contar con el apoyo de FRAC y de kiva, ya que gracias a esto ahora goza de mejores ventas y surtido en el negocio, que le ayuda, para continuar ahorrando parte de sus ganancias.
texts.en:
Edila is a very responsible person and she says she really likes her job. She is 20 years old and a single mother. She has a little 3 month old baby. She sell fish and produce in the market in the community next to hers. She has done this for 2 years.

She decided to start this business to seek a better quality of life for her daughter and to help her family with the household expenses. She also wanted to improve her financial solvency and ensure her daughter's future. She will invest the loan she received in buying more fish, chiles, tomatoes, green beans, squash, chayotes, etc. to continue her sales.  

Edila's biggest wish for her business is to increase her investment to grow the business quickly. She would like to sell fruit and thus improve and increase her earnings even more, while continuing to support her family.

She is very satisfied that she is able to count on support from FRAC and from Kiva, since thanks to that support she now has better sales and her business is better stocked. It has helped her to keep saving a part of her earnings.

loans.use: to invest in buying more fish, chiles, tomatoes, green beans, squash, chayotes, etc.

loans.name: Damaso

texts.es:
El señor Dámaso es una persona muy trabajadora, cuenta con 49 años de edad y está casado con la señora Estefanía con quien tiene 4 hijos, de los cuales solo miguel y ángel estudian, el mayor cursa el segundo año de prepa y el otro estudia sexto año de primaria, ya que los otros 2 están casados, el es pescador desde hace 20 años.
Don Dámaso dice que decidió iniciar con esta actividad, ya que quería buscar de manera de apoyar a su esposa con los gastos de la casa, y a sus hijos con sus estudios, también porque quiere mejorar aun mas su calidad de vida, el crédito que recibió lo va a invertir en la compra de tarrayas, carnada y renta de pangos (lanchas).
La meta que él dice tener para su negocio, y espera poder cumplirla es la de invertirle muchísimo más, para hacerlo crecer rápidamente, ya que quiere comprarse un pango y así ya no tener que rentarlo, ya que así incrementara un poco mas sus ganancias, para asegurar su futuro y el de su familia.
Le da las gracias a los prestatarios de kiva, por la confianza que le están brindando, ya que gracias a ese apoyo ahora cuenta con una mejor calidad de vida y solvencia económica, también continuara con la inversión en su negocio, para mejorarlo mucho más.
texts.en:
Damaso is a very hard-working person.  He is 49 years old and is married to Estefanía with whom he has 4 children.  Two of his children, Miguel and Angel, are students.  The oldest is in his second year of high school and the other is in his sixth year of primary school.  The other two children are married.  Damaso has been a fisherman for 20 years. 

Damaso says that he decided to start this business because he wanted to find a way to support his wife with the expenses of the household and his children with their studies, and also to improve his quality of life.  With the loan that he received he will invest it in the purchase of nets and bait, and to rent boats.

The goal he says he has for his business, which he hopes to be able to achieve, is to invest in it a lot more to make it grow. He wants to buy himself a boat so he doesn't have to rent one.  In this way he can increase his profits a little bit more to ensure his future and that of his family.  He gives thanks to the Kiva lenders for the trust they are giving him.  Thanks to their support he now has a better quality of life and economic solvency.  He will also continue with the investment in his business to improve it much more.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of nets and bait, and to rent boats.

loans.name: Pedro

texts.es:
El señor Pedro es un hombre muy trabajador cuenta con 59 años de edad y dice que su trabaja le gusta mucho, está casado con la señora Dalila, con quien tiene 3 hijos de los cuales ya los 3 están casados y tiene su vida aparte, el es pescador desde hacen 20 años, el se encarga de sacar los pescados y su esposa los lleva a vender al mercado del pueblo vecino.
Don Pedro dice que decidió iniciar con esta actividad, ya que quería buscar la manera de apoyar un poco más a su esposa con los gastos de la casa y con la educación de sus hijos, también para tener una mejor solvencia económica y calidad de vida, el crédito que recibió lo va a invertir en la compra de material de trabajo como: tarrayas y carnada, para continuar con sus actividad.
El tiene una meta para su negocio, dice que desea hacerlo crecer muchísimo, ya que quiere construir un pequeño local, para poner su pescadería y así tener una mejor producción y ventas, ya que contara con mejores ingresos.
Esta muy agradecido con los donadores de kiva y FRAC, por todo el apoyo y confianza que le están brindando, ya que gracias a esta ayuda ahora puede continuar invirtiendo en su negocio y apoyar a su familia.
texts.en:
Pedro is a hard working man who is 59 years old. He says that he really likes his work. He is married to Dalila, with whom he has 3 children. All 3 are married and have their own separate lives. He has been a fisherman for 20 years. He gets the fish and his wife takes them to the market to sell in the market of a town nearby.
   
Pedro says that he decided to start this activity because he was looking for a way to support his wife a little more with the household expenses and their children's education. He also wanted to be more solvent and have a better quality of life. He will invest the loan he received in buying work materials such as: nets and bait. This will help him continue to do his activity.

He has a goal for his business. He says that he wants it to grow a lot, since he has always wanted to build a little locale to open a fish store and thus have better production and sales, and better income.

He is very grateful to the Kiva and FRAC donors for the support and trust they are offering him. Thanks to their help, he can continue to invest in his business and support his family.

loans.use: to invest in buying work materials such as: nets and bait.

loans.name: Myriam Sonia

texts.es:
Myriam es una mujer casada de 37 años,  su esposo se dedica a realizar el servicio de transporte público a través de un taxi. Juntos tienen 2 hijos, un pequeño de apenas 2 añitos y uno que cursa el nivel de secundaria con 15 años de edad. 

Myriam se dedica a la venta de productos ORIFLAME (Cosméticos, Perfumes, Collares, Aretes, entre otros), con la finalidad de generar otro ingreso se dedica también a ser operadora en una empresa de taxis (consiste en recepcionar llamadas y dirigir a los taxistas a zonas donde clientes solicitan sus servicios). Ella conocía ya del negocio de venta de cosméticos y le entusiasmó mucho la idea de negocio, ella le vende a sus amigas y conocidos, también le agrada muchísimo conocer a gente nueva.  En un día Myriam puede ganar 38 soles  que junto a las ganancias de su esposo le permiten poder pagar lo básico para su familia. Actualmente desea que los prestatarios Kiva puedan ayudarla para poder comprar productos ORIFLAME que se encuentran en oferta por acercase Navidad.

Esta mejora podrá ayudarle a tener nuevos productos que ofrecer y así poder en algunos meses tener muchos más clientes que le permitan ganar mucho más y esto la ayudará a cumplir su gran sueño: "Quiero ser gerente de mi zona vendiendo a muchos más clientes y también deseo que mis hijos sean exitosos profesionales".
texts.en:
Myriam is 37 years old, and she is married.  Her husband provides public transportation with a taxi.  They have two children.  The little one is barely two years old, and the 15 year old goes to high school.

Myriam sells Oriflame products (cosmetics, perfume, necklaces, and earrings, among others).  In order to generate another income she also works as an operator at a taxi company (consists of taking calls and directing the taxi drivers to the area where customers request their services).

She already knew the business of selling cosmetics, and she was very enthusiastic about the idea.  She sells to her friends and acquaintances.  It also gives her great pleasure to meet new people.  Myriam is able to earn 38 soles a day.  Together with her husband’s earnings they are able to pay for their family’s basics.

She currently wishes that the Kiva lenders are able to help her buy Oriflame products that are now a special offer because Christmas is coming.  This improvement will help her to have new products to sell.  That way she will be able to have a lot more customers in a few months.  This will allow her to earn a lot more.  It will help her fulfill her big dream, “I want to be the manager in my zone, selling to a lot more customers.  I also wish for my children to become successful professionals.”

loans.use: to buy cosmetics, perfume, necklaces, and earrings, among others.

loans.name: Shalom 5 & 6 Group

texts.en:
Maria is the coordinator of the “Shalom 5 & 6” group, located in the town of Hato Mayor, which is one of the most rural towns in the Dominican Republic, surrounded by mountains and lush vegetation.

Maria is running a business selling clothing. She is the mother of three children, but only one lives with her and her long term partner. She tells us that her most difficult challenge is to have her own house, built in a concrete block structure. Her most favorite activity is working and doing business. This is her 9th loan, after having repaid her previous loans satisfactorily. She has had her business for around six years, starting with the first loan she received from us. 

Maria will use this loan to purchase jeans, shirts, underwear and women's clothes such as blouses, skirts, underwear and other items. She is planning to use her business profits to save because she wants to start building her house. She thanks all of you for your support.

loans.use: to buy clothing for her business (pants, shirts, underwear, and blouses).

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es: María del Carmen, está casada y vive con sus 3 hijos y su esposo que son su mayor prioridad. Ella con el crédito va comprar una maquina de costura que le hace falta para su taller de costura, y también comprara materiales como telas, hilos, encajes y otros productos más para la elaboración de manualidades. Ella actualmente cuenta con el local de costura y quiere comprar esta máquina para elaborar más trabajo para ella y así aumentara su clientela dándole a su trabaja más respaldo y calidad de acabado. Ella tiene como meta aumentar sus ganancias y darle a su esposo una ayuda extra para las responsabilidades del hogar y así también mejorar o contribuir con la estabilidad económica. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
María del Carmen is married and lives with her 3 children and her husband, who are her top priority.

She will use her loan to buy a sewing machine that is needed for her sewing shop, as well as to buy materials such as fabrics, threads, lace and other products for the production of handicrafts. She currently has a location for her shop and wants to buy this sewing machine to produce more and so increase her clientele by giving her work more support and a quality finish. 

Her goal is to increase her profits and give her husband extra help with household responsibilities and thus enhance and contribute to their economic stability. It is her first loan from FUDECOSUR. She hasn't had other loans in state banks before, but FUDECOSUR has given her the loan with improved ease and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of machines and craft materials.

loans.name: Mohamed

texts.en:
Mohamed lives in the coastal town of Changamwe, Kenya. He owns a retail shop which has been in operation for the last five years. He is married and has three children; one is still in school. 
Mohamed was introduced to Milango by his friends. He decided to join in order to access credit. He is currently applying for a loan of Ksh 40,000 to purchase more retail stock for his shop, e.g. sugar, salt, flour etc. Mohamed also owns a taxi; car hire transport.
His main challenge is the overall inflation in the country which has reduced the purchasing power of most customers. He is looking forward to owning a three wheeler vehicle commonly called a tuktuk. Mohamed will use the additional income obtained from this loan to meet his family’s daily needs.

loans.use: To purchase more retail stock for his shop e.g. sugar, salt, flour etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase spare parts for his vehicle

loans.name: Rose

texts.en: Rose, a widow, resides in Mombasa, Kenya, where she has operated a grocery stall for six years, having started the business from personal savings. Rose learnt of Milango from her friends and, because she lacks the personal capital to make the purchase, is now requesting a loan of Ksh 20,000 to buy fruits and vegetables for sale. She looks forward to growing the business and employing more people in the future.

loans.use: to purchase fruits and vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Samuel

texts.en:
Samuel lives in Changamwe, Kenya. He is married and has four children; three of whom are in school. He owns a food stall which he began this year. There are a high number of customers in the area; mainly port workers, who come to take meals from his stall. Besides this, he is also a teacher.
He learnt of Milango from his friends. Samuel is applying for a loan of Ksh 20,000 to purchase more meat and flour.
His main constraint has been the lack of manpower since he could not employ more people, because the business was still new. He looks forward to converting the business into a hotel and even acquiring more space so he can serve more clients.
Samuel will use the additional income from this loan to pay school fees and also purchase seeds and fertilizers.

loans.use: To purchase more meat and flour.

loans.name: Emilia

texts.es: Emilia, de 44 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora y empeñosa, está casada con Julio quien es técnico agropecuario, viene en compañía  de su esposo y sus dos hijos de 24 y 13 años de edad, a los que quiere mucho, instalados cómodamente en su propia casa. La actividad que realiza Emilia es la confección de prendas de vestir de damas como lencerías  y prendas interiores de niños, iniciándose con una apoyo financiero que le valió para comprar su primera maquina de coser que la instaló en su propia casa, atendiendo primero pedido de sus familiares hasta ganar poco a poco más clientes entres sus amistades y vecinos,  gracias a su buen trabajo que aprendió de su hermana hace 15 años, en la actualidad viene estudiando en un centro de educación ocupacional para perfeccionarse. Lo que le gusta de su actividad es el poder contar con una ocupación para dedicarse y mantenerse ocupada que le permita tener un ingreso económico, que le permiten brindarle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia. Al contario lo que le incomoda un poco es el cansancio físico que le ocasiona estar varias horas en una misma postura, pero eso no la desanima y espera poder abrir una boutique en su casa. Este será el primer préstamo con la institución MFP, por tanto espera de su colaboración, para continuar con sus objetivos. Por otro lado se compromete una vez más de cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas, para tener un buen record crediticio. Además le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas que son responsables y muy solidarias. Con el monto solicitado de 1000 nuevos soles comprará una nueva maquina de coser valorizada en 700 nuevos soles, y con el saldo comprará materiales de costura como telas, hilos y otros.
texts.en:
Emilia is 44 years old. She is a hardworking and persevering woman. She is married to Julio who is an agricultural technician. She lives with her husband and her two children who are 24 and 13 years old, she loves them very much, all living comfortably in their own house. Emilia creates clothing for women such as lingerie and underwear for children. She began the business with financial support that was enough to buy her first sewing machine that she set up in her own home.

Her first customers were her relatives but little by little she won more clients among her friends and neighbors, thanks to the good work she learned from her sister 15 years ago. Currently she is studying in a vocational training center in order to become perfect. 

What she likes about her work is being able to focus and remain busy permitting her to have income, in order to give a better quality of life to her family. On the other hand, what bothers her is the physical fatigue from being in the same position for many hours, but this does not dishearten her and she hopes to be able to open a boutique in her own home.

This will be her first loan with MFP, therefore she is waiting for assistance, in order to continue with her plans and she promises to make her payments on time, once again, in order to have a good credit record. She likes being a part of the communal bank because all the people are trustworthy and very supportive.

With the 1000 soles from the loan she will buy a new sewing machine costing 700 soles and the balance will be used to buy sewing supplies such as fabrics, thread, and other items.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine and supplies such as fabric and thread.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase cement, bricks, sand, iron, and labor.

loans.name: Loice

texts.en:
Loice lives in Mombasa, Kenya. She is single and has three children. Loice started a school out of her passion to see children obtain basic education. She is single and has three children. She purchased the land, put up a small class unit and children began enrolling. She has run the school for fifteen years and has seen a number of children get a good foundation in education. 
Loice learnt of Milango from her friends and joined in order to access credit. Her only challenge is that some children cannot afford to pay fees on time, hence hampering service delivery. She has set a target of having more streams per class in future. Loice is applying for a loan of Ksh 40,000 to renovate the classrooms during this vacation. The income obtained from this loan will enable her pay teachers’ salaries.

loans.use: To renovate the classrooms during this vacation

loans.name: Milkah

texts.en:
Milkah lives in Changamwe, Kenya. She owns a nursery school which has been in operation for two years. She is married and has five children; three have begun schooling. Milkah learnt of Milango from her friends. She had earlier applied for a first loan and has completed the repayment. She also sells dried fish.

Milkah is applying for a loan of Ksh 45,000 to purchase text books, charts, exercise books and desks. Her main challenge is that some children delay paying the school fees. Her main aim is to steer the investment till she can provide primary level education to the children around the area.
The income obtained from this loan will help her pay her own children’s school fees and also provide good health care for them.

loans.use: To purchase text books, charts, exercise books and desks.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase meat and dairy products for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy beef, chicken and pork.

loans.name: Francisco Daniel

texts.es:
El municipio de Telica se caracteriza por tener varios puestos de pulpería y son muchas las personas que visitan dichos puestos para las compras necesarias para el hogar.

El señor Francisco Danielposee su propia pulpería y actualmente está solicitando un crédito para la compra de productos como arroz, aceite, azúcar, papel higiénico, jabón y ace para continuar ofertándolos en su pulpería. De igual manera, con el crédito comprará algunos medicamentos para mejorar la salud ya que ha estado afectado y requiere la compra de dichos productos.

Espera en que Ceprodel le brindará el apoyo y así surtirá su pulpería para beneficio propio y de los clientes.
texts.en:
The municipality of Telica is known for its grocery stalls and many people visit these to buy necessary home products.

Mr. Francisco Daniel has his own stall and is requesting a loan to buy products such as rice, oil, sugar, toilet tissue, soap and bleach so he can have them on hand always.  He also plans to use the loan to buy medicines to improve his health since he has been ill and needs them.

He hopes he can count on Ceprodel for the support so he can stock his store for his and his customers' benefit.

loans.use: To pay for medical visits and exams and buy medicines.  Also to buy rice, sugar, oil, toilet tissue, soap and bleach.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy several gallons of milk.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy products such as rice, oil, sugar, toilet tissue, soap and bleach for her store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy food ingredients and soda.

loans.name: Madai Gabina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal  ”RICCHARY CUSCO; El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac en la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Madai;  La socia tiene 38 años de edad, la socia es soltera, La socia tiene 3 hijos de 18, 12, 7 años de edad;  La socia se dedica  a la compra venta de granos la socia desea invertir el crédito en la compra y venta de granos secos y de cereales en el mercado, la socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de cereales y de granos.
La socia agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en: The member belongs to the communal bank, “Ricchary Cusco.” The communal bank is located in the district of Huanchac in the province of Cusco and district of Cusco. The member is Mrs. Madai. She is 38 years old and single. She has 3 children ages 18, 12, and 7. She  buys and sells grain for a living. She wants to invest her loan in the purchase and sale of dry grains and cereals in the market. She is requesting the loan to invest in the purchase of cereals and grains. She is grateful for the loan and promises to comply with the payment of the loan installments according to the payment schedule.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of cereals and grains.

loans.name: Reyna

texts.es: Reyna de 41 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora y empeñosa, además de muy decidida y alegre, está casada con Wander con quien comparten el negocio familiar, fruto de esa unión tienen dos hijos de 17 y 9 años de edad, por quienes se esmera en salir adelante. Juntos habitan en su propia casa. El negocio familiar que tiene Reyna es la fabricación de silla de fierro. Se inició en ese negocio, debido a que sufrió un accidente de trabajo y le liquidaron recibiendo en la actualidad una pensión. De dicha liquidación lo invirtió en el negocio que tiene actualmente, que es fabricación de sillas, para luego venderlo a los comerciantes de las zonas céntricas de la ciudad y también por la zona donde vive. Lo que le gusta de su actividad es realizar una actividad en compañía de su esposo, apoyándose mutuamente. Del mismo modo las ganancias que le deja son de 300 nuevos soles por docena entregada. Sin embargo, lo que no le gusta de su actividad es a su esposo le está afectando la visión debido a la soldadura, por eso tiene pensado delegar esta parte de trabajo a otro taller. Así mismo tienen planes de ampliar su negocio, abrir una tienda nueva de venta de repuestos de motor. Este será el primer préstamo con la institución MFP, Por ello espera de su colaboración para que pueda concretar sus planes. Con el monto solicitado de 1000 nuevos soles lo invertirá en la compra de materiales para su negocio como fierros, soldadura, pintura y otros.
texts.en: Reya, 41 years of age, is a hardworking woman and entrepreneur who is also determined and cheerful. She is married to Wander, with whom she shares the family business. They have two children, ages 17 and 9, for whom they strive to succeed. Together they live in their own house. The family business that Reyna has is the manufacturing of iron chairs. She started in this business because she suffered a work accident and is now receiving a pension settlement. From said settlement, she invested in the business that she now has, which is the fabrication of chairs, to later sell to traders in the central zone of the city and also in the zone where they live. What she likes about her livelihood, is working in the company of her husband, supporting each other. In this way, the earnings that it gives them are 300 nuevos soles for each dozen delivered. However, that which she does not like about their business is that the welding is affecting her husband’s vision. For that, she has thought of delegating this part of the job to another shop. At the same time, she has plans to grow her business, opening a new store selling motor parts. This will be her first loan with the MFP Institution, in which she relies on their collaboration to be able to realize her plans. With the amount requested of 1000 nuevos soles, she will invest in the purchase of materials for her business such as iron, welding, paint, and more.

loans.use: to buy iron, welding, and paint.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clothing of different sizes and styles such as women's blouses, gel, white t-shirts for men, fine shirts for men, matches, and youth white t-shirts.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy construction materials to improve his quality of life

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to do home improvements.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy various species of wood, thinner and varnish.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy merchandise to stock her business.

loans.name: Sindy

texts.es: Sindy de 23 años de edad, es una joven empeñosa y trabajadora, además de alegre y sociable, es soltera, vive en compañía de su padre, madre y sus dos hermanos de 24 y 15 años de edad, instalados cómodamente en casa de sus padres. Sindy tiene un negocio familiar que comparte con sus padres y hermanos, siendo ella la administradora de dicho negoico. Pues consiste en la fabricación de cocinas de lata que funciona a carbón, actividad que se inició hace 10 años, y es fue por iniciativa de uno de sus cuñados, quien le enseñó ese oficio a su padre, y del que luego transmitiera estos conocimientos a sus hijos. Actualmente su negocio ha crecido, y tiene mucha demanda del producto, en donde todos los miebros de su familia participan, asimismo cuentan con el apoyo de ayudante al que pagan por cocina elaborada. Lo que le gusta de su actividad es el ingreso económico que le ayuda a solventar sus gastos del hogar, así como la unión familiar que se da gracias al negocio. Al contrario lo que le desagrada un poco es el desorden que se ocasiona con los materiales que usan, por eso tienen planes de ampliar su negocio, y mas adelante también incursionar en otros rubros como abrir una tienda de librería y bazar. Este será el primer préstamo con la institución MFP, Por tanto espera de un pequeño préstamo para que pueda cumplir con sus objetivos. Además de sentirse bien con su banco comunal pues conoce a sus miembros y los considera buenas personas. Con el monto solicitado de 800 nuevos soles lo invertirá en la compra de materiales para su negocio como parrillas, laminas de lata, pinturas.
texts.en:
Sindy, 23, is an enterprising, hardworking young woman in addition to being very sociable.  She’s single and lives comfortably in her parents’ house with her father, her mother and two siblings who are 24 and 15 years old.


Sindy has a family business that she shares with her parents and siblings; she is the manager.  It consists in manufacturing metal, coal-burning stoves.  She started this activity 10 years ago thanks to the initiative of one of her brothers-in-law who taught this occupation to her father and then he passed down these skills to his children.


The business has grown and the product is in high demand.  All the family members participate and they also have a helper who is paid by the completed unit.  What she likes about her activity is the income which helps to cover household expenses as well as the family unity that the business creates.  On the other hand, she dislikes somewhat the mess the materials they use cause and this is why they have plans to enlarge the business as well as going into other business later on like opening a stationery shop and a store.


This will be the first MFP loan so she hopes that this small loan will lead to her reaching her goals.  She feels good in her communal bank because she knows the members and she considers them to be good people.  She will use the requested 800 new soles to buy materials for the business like grilles, metal sheets and paint.

loans.use: to buy grilles, metal sheets and paint.

loans.name: Martha Amalia

texts.es:
Doña Martha sigue con su inversion de negocio, en donde en estos años, ha logrado crecer en inventario, gracias   a los financiamiento que la institucion ha dado, al esfuerzo, y capital invertido, de cada dia, que junto a su esposo se integran en su pulperia al servicio del cliente.
Con este nuevo prestamo comprara, arroz, frijoles,azucar, productos de la coca cola, carne, pollo, golosinas entre otros que ayude a mantener a su clientela, sastifecha al ofertar sus productos. Y que espera seguir manteniendo el equilibrio, de sus ventas y logrando apoyar  asus hijos atraves de los estudios.
texts.en:
Martha continues investing in her business where she’s managed to increase inventory these last few years thanks to the loans the institution has given her, to the effort she puts into it and to the invested capital every day that she and her husband put into the store to provide service to customers.


She will use this new loan to buy rice, beans, sugar, Coca-Cola products, meat, chicken, and snacks among others that will help her keep her customers satisfied with her offers.  She hopes to maintain balance in sales to manage to support her children throughout their schooling.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Luis Alonso

texts.es:
En el municipio de Managua, el señor Luis Alonso es una persona luchadora debido a que ha sabido llevar el bienestar a su casa para darle una mejor condición de vida a su familia, es una persona acompañado y tiene su cargo a  una persona.
Con este crédito que Ceprodel le ha otorgado agradece porque así le ha dado un mejor nivel de vida a su familia, con este desembolso lo utilizara para comprar materiales como servicio higiénico, bloque, cemento, hierro para construir baño para darle mejor seguridad a su vivienda.
texts.en:
In the city of Managua, is Luis Alonso who is a fighter due to the fact that he has taken care of the wellbeing of his house in order to give his family a better quality of life. He has one person in his care.

He is thankful for the loan from Ceprodel that he has obtained as it has given a higher level of life to his family. He will use the money from this loan to buy supplies such as a toilet, blocks, cement, and iron to be used in bathroom construction in order to have better security in his home.

loans.use: to buy construction materials in order to improve his housing

loans.name: Luisa Amanda

texts.es:
Doña Luisa, sigue con sus ventas de comida, una variedad de fritanga, en donde ha captado su clientela, su esposo sigue trabajando y ambos siguen mejorando la infraestructura del negocio, con el credito anterior, logro cambiar laminas de zinc del bajarete de su negocio, levanto mas el fogon de la cocina con el objetivo de estar en mejores condiciones para preparar la venta.
Para Luisa este año ha sido, estable a pesar que en estos ultimos meses se ha visto bastante mal de salud, con dolores en la espalda, el cual tuvieron que someter a cirugia, y que se ha venido mejorando sactifactoriamente.
Es por tal razon, desea seguir, haciendo sus ventas, que con este nuevo financiamiento, comprara productos en granos basicos como: arroz, frijoles, bidon de aceite, azucar, carne, pollo, platanos y frutas para hacer refresco.   logrando tener sus ingresos, y poder ayudarse con la compra de los medicamentos que sigue tomando, para mejorar su salud.
Cuenta con el apoyo de sus tres hijos, los cuales son casados. Y sobre todo con el apoyo financiero de Afodenic.
texts.en:
Luisa is continuing with her business selling a variety of fried foods, where she has attracted a customer base.  Her husband continues to work, and they are both working to improve the infrastructure of her business.  With the previous loan, she was able to put new corrugated metal roofing sheets on the covered porch of her business, and raise the kitchen stove so as to improve the conditions of the place where she prepares her food to sell. 

For Luisa, this year has been stable, in spite of the fact that in the most recent months she has had some health problems with pain in her back.  Because of this, she had to undergo surgery, but she is recovering satisfactorily.

For this reason she wants to continue making her sales.   With this new loan, she will buy staple grain products such as: rice, beans, a drum of cooking oil, sugar, meat, chicken, and bananas and fruits to make drinks.  This will allow her to generate income which will help her to pay for the medications that she continues to need in order to improve her health.

Luisa relies on the support of her three children, who are married, and most importantly the financial support of AFODENIC.

loans.use: to buy products such as meat chicken, coca cola, and fruits and vegetables for her food business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy merchandise for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay off some personal debts.

loans.name: Jhon Richard

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal  ”RICCHARY CUSCO; El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac en la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
El socio es el Sr. Jhon Richard;  El socio tiene 32 años de edad, El socio es conviviente, El socio tiene su  propio negocio de compra y venta de peluches, el socio trabaja trayendo la mercadería junto a su conyugue desde las ciudades de Tacna, Arequipa, Lima; el socio viaja cada mes a traer mercadería y en esta ocasión debido a las fiestas navideñas el socio desea viajar a traer peluches para venderlos la víspera de navidad, el socio tiene su local en un conocido centro Comercial, en este local el socio tiene su stand. El socio requiere el préstamo para invertir en la compra de peluches para la venta en la víspera de navidad, el socio también utilizara el crédito para los pasajes que hará.
El socio agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
Jhon Richard is a member of the “Ricchary Cusco” communal bank located in Huanchac District in Cusco Province and Department.  He is 23 years old and has a spouse.


He has his own business selling stuffed toys.  He and his spouse bring merchandise from the cities of Tacna, Arequipa and Lima.  He travels each month to bring merchandise and on this occasion because of the Christmas festivities he wants to make a trip to bring stuffed toys to sell for Christmas.  He has a stand in a well-known shopping center.


He needs the loan to buy stuffed toys to sell during the Christmas season and will also use the loan to pay for transportation costs for the trips he’ll take.  He is grateful for the loan and commits to make his payments according to the payment schedule.

loans.use: to buy stuffed toys and pay transportation costs.

loans.name: Ana

texts.es: Ana, de 32 años de edad; es madre soltera vive en casa alquilada junto a sus dos hijos Ingrid de 07 años y Yorsin de 11 años a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. Ana, es un ejemplo de madre que se esfuerza por darles lo mejor a sus hijos; pues ella se dedica a la venta de bebidas como: refrescos, cremoladas, gaseosas, cerveza. Sus principales clientes son sus vecinos, pues saben que los refrescos que toman es de fruta natural y la  atención es amable de parte de Ana. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es poder conversar con sus vecinos, pues desde hace 05 meses que trabaja en esta actividad y considera rentable este negocio, por lo que desea ampliarlo y tener más productos que ofrecer. Este será su préstamo número 02 con MFP, por tanto espera de su colaboración para continuar con sus objetivos de trabajo. En su banco comunal agradece a sus compañeros por elegirla como presidenta de su grupo. Con los 2,000 nuevos soles, podrá invertirlo en la comprar gaseosas, cervezas y  frutas para elaborar refresco como: piña, maíz morado, fresa, etc.
texts.en:
Ana, 32, is a single mother living in a rented house with her two children: Ingrid, 7, and Yorsin, 11 that she wants to provide a better quality of life for.  


Ana is an example of a mother who strives to provide the best for her children.  She sells beverages like  fruit smoothies, soft-drinks and beer.  Her main customers are her neighbors because they know that the refreshments they are enjoying are made from fresh fruit and Ana treats them with kindness.


What she likes best about her work is chatting with her neighbors.  She’s been in this line of work for five months and she believes it’s profitable so wants to expand it and have more products to sell.


This will be her MFP loan #2 so she hopes for your support to continue toward her work goals.  She thanks her fellow communal bank members for electing her President.


She will use the 2000 new soles to buy soft-drinks, beer and fruit to make smoothies with: pineapple, purple corn, strawberries, etc.

loans.use: to buy soft-drinks, beer and various types of fruit.

loans.name: Nelson Jose

texts.es:
Nelson es un joven de 25 años de edad, casado, padre de dos hijos pequeños, el de siete año terminando el año escolar y el otro aun no va al colegio, su trabajo actual es como acopiador de marisco, trabajo que hace desde su juventud, y que logro hacer su pequeña casa.
Que hoy en dia, desea seguir construyendo, un anexo de cuarto, comprando materiales de construccion en piedra, bloques, arena, cemento, hierro, laminas de zinc, perlines, entre otros materiales y comenzar la obra.
Lo que para el es de gran sastifaccion el poder seguir dando condiciones de mejoras de vivienda a sus pequeños hijos, cuenta con el apoyo de sus suegros, ya que cuando se le hace dificil una situacion economica son auxiliados por ellos, lo que, es de gran ayuda. Asi como este finnaciamiento que esta abriendo puerta para una mejor vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Nelson, 25, is a married young man and father of two little children.  The seven-year-old is finishing his school term and the other one does not attend school yet.  He currently works as a seafood consolidator, a job he’s had since his youth and that has made it possible for him to build his small house.


He wants to continue building on to it adding a room.  He needs to buy building materials like stone, blocks, sand, cement, rebar, metal sheets and purlines, among others to start the project.


It’s a big satisfaction for him to be able to continue giving his children better living conditions.  His in-laws help him out because when the economic situation is difficult they come to his aid which is a great help as is this loan that’s opening a door to a better life for his family.

loans.use: to add a room.

loans.name: Elvia Maribel

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal  ”RICCHARY CUSCO; El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac en la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Elvia;  La socia tiene 30 años de edad, La socia es conviviente, La socia tiene su  propio negocio de compra y venta de peluches, La socia trabaja trayendo la mercadería junto a su conyugue desde las ciudades de Tacna, Arequipa, Lima; La socia  viaja cada mes a traer mercadería y en esta ocasión debido a las fiestas navideñas La socia desea viajar a traer peluches para venderlos la víspera de navidad, La socia tiene su local en un conocido centro de comercio. La socia requiere el préstamo para invertir en la compra de peluches para la venta en la víspera de navidad, La socia también utilizara el crédito para los pasajes que hará.
La socia agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the communal bank Ricchary Cusco. This communal bank can be found in the district of Huanchac in the province of Cusco, and department of Cusco.

The member is Elvia. She is 30 years old. The member lives with her life-partner. She has her own business selling and buying stuffed toys. The member and her husband work together to bring back the merchandise from the cities of Tacna, Arequipa, and Lima.
